articles.title: Office for iPad is getting mouse and trackpad support later this year - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is working on cursor support for Office for iPad. It’s expected to arrive later this year, by the fall. Support will include mouse and trackpad on iPadOS across Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
